name: Kidnapped (itch)
description:
Description:

In Kidnapped, so far there are 5 areas:
-The Starting Room (Cabin)
-The Forest
-The Generator House (as we like to call it)
-The Basement of the Generator House
-The Closet in the Basement of the Generator House

There are 22 texts you can access:
CABIN TEXTS
-This one will appear when you first enter the game. It is a tutorial.
-This one is accessed by going up and "talking" (that's what we call it when you go up and press "E" while standing next to an object) to the door in the Cabin.
-This one is accessed by going up and "talking" to the window when you aren't holding the chair.
PATHS
There are two paths in the forest. Path one is accessed by "talking" to the generator house before you grab the key, Path two by grabbing the key before "talking" to the generator house.
PATH ONE TEXTS
-The first one is accessed by "talking" to the generator house before grabbing the key.
-The second one is accessed by "talking" to the red bush with the key in it after talking to the generator house.
PATH TWO TEXTS
-The first one is accessed by "talking" to the red bush with the key before talking to the generator house.
-The second one is accessed by "talking" to the generator house with the key in hand. Keep in mind this has to be the first time you "talk" to the generator house.
OTHER FOREST TEXTS
-This one will appear when you first enter the forest.
-This one is accessed by "talking" to the gate without the key.
-This one is accessed by "talking" to the gate with the key.
-This one is accessed by "talking" to the cabin without the key.
-This one one is accessed by "talking" to the cabin while holding the key. 
GENERATOR HOUSE TEXTS
-This one appears when you first enter the generator house.
-This one is accessed by trying to leave the generator house AKA by "talking" to the door.
-This one is accessed by opening the trapdoor AKA by "talking" to the trapdoor.
GENERATOR HOUSE BASEMENT TEXTS
-This one appears when you first enter the basement.
-This one is accessed by "talking" to the table.
-This one is accessed by "talking" to the table with the monitors.
-This one is accessed by "talking" to the lever.
-This one is accessed by "talking" to the keypad. It is a tutorial.
-This one is accessed by "talking" to the closet door BEFORE you unlock it.

Controls:
-Press "R" to set stuff down/use stuff when you are holding it.
-Press "E" to "talk" to/to access something.
-Use the arrow keys to move.
-Press "Z" to do almost anything that involves text.

MOST OF THE PIXEL ART IS TEMPORARY, ESPECIALLY IN THE GENERATOR HOUSE AND THE GENERATOR HOUSE BASEMENT.
